We are a racing team and constructor using Hydrogen to build a Cleaner Future.

We are building an open-source, Hydrogen fueled power unit for vehicles to bring us towards a more Carbon Negative future.

Long Term R + D

Upcoming technology + innovation

Engineering Documentation

Detailed design + documentation

Design Methodology + Safety

Developing rigorous standards for both safety + design

the 2023 Bike—'Toothless'

The bike + races + data

Recent Posts

Wild Rabbit Moto Show!

MIT EVT takes the "Best in Show" and "Best Creative Mod" awards at the Wild Rabbit Community Moto Show 2023!

Roaming on Battery Power!

We just hit the first major milestone of our project, having the bike drive on its own power.

Primary Partner—Doosan Mobility Innovation (DMI)

We are partnering with DMI, a leader in fuel cell technology for drones and small vehicles.
